soap.local.entity

Class DateCriterionChoice

  • soap.local.entity.SOAPBaseType
    • soap.local.entity.GWObject
      • soap.local.entity.DateCriterionChoice

  • public class DateCriterionChoice
extends GWObject
    A component used as part of a larger search criteria entity. Encapsulates the information entered by the user to restrict the search to a particular date range. Specifies the date field to be restricted and allows the date range to be restricted either through a typelist of preset ranges (such as next 30 days) or through a start and end date.

    Very similar to DateCriteria, but DateCriterionChoice supports configurable search. (See the Configuration Guide for details of customizing search screens.)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Integer BeanVersion
      Auto-incremented object version
      String ChosenOption
      The chosen configurable search option, specifies the date field to be restricted.
      DateRangeChoiceType DateRangeChoice
      The chosen preset date range, if any. The available ranges are filtered by the SearchType field. Used if DateSearchType is "fromlist". NOTE: when inserting a DateCriterionChoice this field must be non-null.
      DateSearchType DateSearchType
      The type of date search, either "fromlist" (for a preset range) or "enteredrange" (for an explicitly entered range). NOTE: when inserting a DateCriterionChoice this field must be non-null.
      Calendar EndDate
      The end (inclusive) of the date range to which the chosen date field should be restricted. Used if DateSearchType is "enteredrange".
      SearchObjectType SearchType
      The type of search, filters the preset ranges allowed in the DateRangeChoice field. NOTE: when inserting a DateCriterionChoice this field must be non-null.
      Calendar StartDate
      The start (inclusive) of the date range to which the chosen date field should be restricted. Used if DateSearchType is "enteredrange".

      • Fields inherited from class soap.local.entity.GWObject

        PublicID, refType

    • Field Detail

      • BeanVersion

        Integer BeanVersion
        Auto-incremented object version

      • ChosenOption

        String ChosenOption
        The chosen configurable search option, specifies the date field to be restricted.

      • DateRangeChoice

        DateRangeChoiceType DateRangeChoice
        The chosen preset date range, if any. The available ranges are filtered by the SearchType field. Used if DateSearchType is "fromlist". NOTE: when inserting a DateCriterionChoice this field must be non-null.

      • DateSearchType

        DateSearchType DateSearchType
        The type of date search, either "fromlist" (for a preset range) or "enteredrange" (for an explicitly entered range). NOTE: when inserting a DateCriterionChoice this field must be non-null.

      • EndDate

        Calendar EndDate
        The end (inclusive) of the date range to which the chosen date field should be restricted. Used if DateSearchType is "enteredrange".

      • SearchType

        SearchObjectType SearchType
        The type of search, filters the preset ranges allowed in the DateRangeChoice field. NOTE: when inserting a DateCriterionChoice this field must be non-null.

      • StartDate

        Calendar StartDate
        The start (inclusive) of the date range to which the chosen date field should be restricted. Used if DateSearchType is "enteredrange".
